This light filled home mixes a wonderful indoor and outdoor lifestyle with an effortless floor plan that seamlessly connects living zones to outdoor spaces. Sitting pretty in a prized court locale with easy access to a host of local amenities, this is an impressive offering for those looking to start their next chapter.
